title: Change Payment Method on File
description: A guest with an upcoming reservation wants to change the credit card used to guarantee the booking.

tasks.description: Securely collect the new credit card information from the guest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the new payment details according to PCI compliance standards.

tasks.description: Update the reservation with the new credit card information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the payment method on the booking.
